item.description: <p>Sapana Neupane, 31, her husband Krishna, 41, and their three-year-old son were killed when the car they were travelling in collided with a truck in Stoneleigh, near Ballarat on Tuesday morning. </p>

item.title: 'Follow the evidence': Doctors and road safety experts call for 30km per hour speed limits
item.description: <p>The bill is currently before parliament and is looking to reduce the speed limit in residential streets from 50 kilometres per hour to 30. </p>

item.title: Images released as search for protesters who allegedly assaulted police officers in Melbourne continues
item.description: <p>Police are trying to track down eight more people who were at the scene of the protest last month.</p>

item.title: Man seriously injured in machete ambush at Melbourne car wash
item.description: <p>The 43-year-old victim was at a car wash in Melbourne&#x27;s inner north-west, when he was ambushed by an armed man with a machete.</p>

item.title: Premier vows to target 'evil adult puppet-masters' driving Victoria youth crime scourge
item.description: <p>The Allan government today announced plans to significantly increase the penalty for adults who recruit children into youth gangs.</p>

item.title: Liberals officially abandon net zero after months of division
item.description: <p>Opposition Leader Sussan Ley has confirmed the Liberal Party will no longer﻿ support hitting net zero by 2050 following a five-hour party room meeting in Canberra yesterday.</p>

item.title: Dodgy real estate agents to face $110,000 fines for misleading listing prices
item.description: <p>The proposed reforms are cracking down on misleading price listings.</p>

item.title: 'I know how dirty Donald is': What emails show about Trump-Epstein link
item.description: <p>There are suggestions throughout that Epstein knew things about Trump that could hurt him.</p>

item.title: 'Cowardly' teen jailed for 16 years for grandmother Vyleen White's murder
item.description: <p>The 70-year-old&#x27;s husband Victor and his three daughters wept as they watched the sentencing via a video link to a nearby courtroom.</p>

item.title: Cost of treatment for deadly cancer slashed dramatically after PBS addition
item.description: <p>Those with multiple myeloma, an incurable blood cancer, would previously pay up to $150,000 for treatment.</p>

item.title: 'Nazi scum' chants greet white supremacist Thomas Sewell as he's released
item.description: <p>Thomas Sewell, 32, hired a top barrister to argue he should be freed for a second time before Melbourne&#x27;s Supreme Court on Wednesday, after an unsuccessful attempt two months ago.</p>

item.title: Fortune teller and daughter accused of $70 million fraud, alleged to have connections to one of Australia's la
item.description: <p>Anya Phan allegedly persuaded victims to take out loans based on her prediction of a billionaire figure in their future.</p>

item.title: Woman charged after suspicious death of elderly woman in Sydney's north-west
item.description: <p>A﻿ woman has been charged with the domestic-violence-related murder of an 84-year-old grandmother in Sydney&#x27;s north-west last month.</p>

item.title: Labor pledges $37 million for Working with Children Check reform
item.description: <p>The federal government has put forward $37 million for childcare reforms aimed at stopping offenders slipping through the cracks between police checks in different states. </p>
